roleset.name: move forwards

role.descr: aspect of arg1 that is actually progressing

example.name: start and end points
example.text: It often is preceded by the development of polyps in the bowel, which *trace*-1 in some cases become increasingly malignant in identifiable stages -- *trace*-1 progressing from less severe to deadly -- as though a cascade of genetic damage might be occurring.

example.name: but usually just ergative
example.text: Our bookings improved as the quarter progressed and September was especially good.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: - I had a bad start to the first term ; student finance was delayed , adding to my stress levels , I was so worried I-1 was unable *PRO*-1 to progress with work , conclusively it all piled up .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'progress' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'progressive' based on BOLT-4,5. Member of VNcls entity_specific_cos-45.5.

frameset.note: Arg 2 added by Julia based on BOLT.
